code:
-spec min_operations(Nums1 :: [integer()], Nums2 :: [integer()]) -> integer().
min_operations(Nums1, Nums2) ->
    Max1 = lists:max(Nums1),
    Max2 = lists:max(Nums2),
    Last1 = lists:last(Nums1),
    Last2 = lists:last(Nums2),
    case {Max1 == Last1 andalso Max2 == Last2, Max1 == Last2 andalso Max2 == Last1} of
        {true, _} -> 0;
        {false, true} -> 1;
        _ ->
            Indexes1 = [Index || {Value, Index} <- lists:zip(Nums1, lists:seq(0, length(Nums1) - 1)), Value == Max1],
            Indexes2 = [Index || {Value, Index} <- lists:zip(Nums2, lists:seq(0, length(Nums2) - 1)), Value == Max2],
            case {lists:any(fun(I) -> lists:member(I, Indexes2) end, Indexes1), lists:any(fun(I) -> lists:member(I, Indexes1) end, Indexes2)} of
                {true, true} -> 2;
                _ -> -1
            end
    end.
